content.description: This route feels tight.  The tree is close to you and the moves feel hard. This is my least favorite on this wall.
content.location:
Furthest left route on side of block facing Tunnel Wall (R).

 Route #1 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: Climb the obvious right facing flake to the top.
content.location:
Swarm is located on the left side of the Entrance Block.

 Route #3 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: Around the corner and to the left of Pumper is a deceiving climb. Start on easy ledges to gain the base of a large offwidth on your left. Steeeem across and reach overhead to pull the crux finish.
content.location:
Around the corner from Pumper.

 Route #7 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: Start about 10 ft to the right of the left side of the main face.  Climb up a shallow arete, then head a bit left, then straight up.   Nothing but jugs, but fairly pumpy.
content.location:
This is the first route on the front (main) face of the Entrance Block that is parallel to the trail.

 Route #9 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

Directly to the right of Hearty and shares anchors with it. 

 Route #6 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

Right most route on the front face of Entrance Block.

 Route #12 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

Second to last route on side of Entrance block facing the trail.

 Route #11 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: Fun sport route that shares anchors with "Make Over."
content.location:
Just to the left of Make Over.

 Route #5 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: Crux is in the middle of the route.  Fun and sustained.
content.location:
Center of the Entrance block. First you see upon entering the Lost Crag.

 Route #10 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

Second route from the right on the heavily equipped side of Entrance block that is perpendicular to the trail.  This route is very close to the trad line, "Swarm" that is just to its right.

 Route #2 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: This route takes great gear in the bottom crack where the climbing is not more than 5.8.  The crux is at the top and well protected with the single bolt on the climb.  It is a very nice mixed climb.
content.location: Route #4 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: Start below the doubble overhangs in the corner. Climb up the blank face and pull into the dihedral. From there, reach up and left and pull over the roof above. Climb easy moves to the top.
content.location:
Directly to the left of Pumper on the Entrance Block.

 Route #8 on Entrance Block on 2019 guide.

content.description: This block used to be the first block that you would come to as you approach the crag.  Since this area's development, there are now several other trails that lead to other blocks.   The most noteworthy climbs on this block are the 3 overhanging, juggy routes on the main face.   They tend to stay wet after a good rain.
